education.institution: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science
education.description: Specialized in Computer Vision and Robotics, with a focus on machine learning algorithms for object detection and recognition systems.
achievements: Graduated with honors, achieving top 5% in class ranking
Completed thesis on 'Real-time object recognition for autonomous robots'
Received university scholarship for academic excellence (2012-2014)
Participated in national robotics competition, securing 2nd place

institutionInfo.description: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science (HCMUS) is one of Vietnam's premier institutions for scientific research and education. Founded in 1941, the university has produced numerous scientists and technologists who have contributed significantly to Vietnam's development.
institutionInfo.address: 227 Nguyen Van Cu Street, District 5, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
